This game is corrupt.  After playing for a while various annoying anomalies creep in, some pretty serious, like all the writing on buttons disappearing.  Others like the pointer not changing to indicate an actionable item or most irritating, constant repetition of the audio snipets which guide you throw your first case.  These (which still could be peculiar to my install) make the game practically un-playable.  Avoid
